Messages.unsupportedPlatform: Connection to BITalino is not supported on Linux
Messages.failedConnect: Unable to connect to BITalino. Make sure the device is paired and in range.
Messages.connectionExists: Connection to the BITalino device exists in the workspace. Clear the existing connection and try again.
Messages.invalidIdentifierValue: Unable to find paired device with specified name or address.
Messages.failedConnectWithArgs: Unable to connect to BITalino with the specified arguments. Make sure the device is paired and in range.
Messages.mismatchedPinValue: Pins and values must be of the same size.
Messages.invalidReadArguments: Invalid input combination. Specify either number of samples or duration.
Messages.failedRead: Unable to receive data from BITalino. Restart the device, clear the existing bitalino object, and create a new connection.
